channel.description: Recent content in Archives: April 2007 on Rootwork.org

item.title: Notes from NTC: Participatory media and the future of online outreach
item.description: Although these two panels – “Leveraging the Power of Participatory Media” and “The Future of Online Outreach” – were held separately at the 2007 Nonprofit Technology Conference, I thought that they related so well that I’d present them together.
